name: Adjacan't
description:
Easy to learn, hard to master? Say no more, got you covered! Embark on a frantic puzzle adventure with Adjacan't 🟩🟨🟦🟥 - a clever game about colouring the board in such a way that no two same-coloured cells touch! Sounds easy enough, right? Then hop on and show us how it's done 🎉

=== 📋 INSTRUCTIONS 📋 ===

(these are also covered in a pretty tutorial with pictures and all in-game but if you prefer plain text - hey, who am I to judge?)

1. The big cloud at the top of your play area is your CURRENT COLOUR (and score). The trail beneath it is your NEXT COLOUR (and High Score).

2. Click on any of the cells to colour it with your CURRENT COLOUR and start the game.

3. Keep colouring the cells by applying your CURRENT COLOUR to any of the cells adjacent to the already coloured ones so that no two same-coloured cells touch (the legal moves are handily marked in light yellow for you so you don't need to figure it all out by hand).

4. Stuck? The upper right hand corner button lets you SWAP the colours in your palette, and the one below it lets you DRAW completely new colours.

The small NUMBERS in their corners show how many uses of each you still have.

5. Keep playing and try to fill up the board!
